statsInfo.title: Project Stats Methodology
statsInfo.subtitle: Each project is dynamically analyzed based on actual codebase structure and technologies.

intelligentRouting.title: Intelligent Analysis Strategy
intelligentRouting.description: Our system automatically detects project type and uses the optimal analysis method:
intelligentRouting.dataProjects: Data Projects â†’ Data Analyst Calculator
intelligentRouting.dataDesc: Detects Pandas, NumPy, Airflow, Streamlit, NLP
intelligentRouting.githubDesc: For public repositories with proper structure
intelligentRouting.detectionLogic: Smart Detection: Pandas + NumPy â†’ Data Analyst Calculator
intelligentRouting.detectionLogic2: Smart Detection: Laravel + React â†’ Software Calculator

typeScoring.title: Project Type-Specific Scoring
typeScoring.dataDetails: Base Score: 70, Pandas: +20 points, Airflow: +22 points, PyTorch: +22 points
typeScoring.softwareDetails: Base Score: 60, Laravel: +20 points, React Native: +18 points, Docker: +5 points

githubAnalysis.title: GitHub Codebase Analysis
githubAnalysis.description: For projects with GitHub URLs, the system performs real-time analysis of the actual codebase including:

fileStructure.title: File Structure
fileStructure.desc: Analyzes folder organization, src/ structure, and file patterns

packageAnalysis.title: Package Analysis
packageAnalysis.desc: Parses package.json, requirements.txt, composer.json for dependencies

testCoverage.title: Test Coverage
testCoverage.desc: Detects test files and calculates test-to-source ratio

cicd.title: CI/CD & Deployment
cicd.desc: Checks for Docker, GitHub Actions, and deployment configs

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.subtext: UI/UX for software, Dashboards for data

backend.title: Backend
backend.subtext: APIs for software, ETL for data

devops.title: DevOps
devops.subtext: Deployment for software, Orchestration for data

footer.title: Key Improvements in New Strategy:
footer.description:
1. Automatic Detection: System identifies project type (Data Analyst vs Software Engineering)
2. Specialized Calculators: Different scoring algorithms for different project types
3. Higher Base Scores: Data projects start at 70 (not 60) to better represent their complexity
4. GitHub Smart Routing: Public repos get GitHub analysis, private repos get calculator fallback
